verses.verse: וַיֹּ֧סֶף <S%H3254><s%> Then again אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <S%H8034><s%> and her name קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> [was] Keturah

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> And she bare ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִמְרָן֙ <S%H2175><s%> him Zimran וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָקְשָׁ֔ן <S%H3370><s%> and Jokshan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְדָ֖ן <S%H4091><s%> and Medan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> and Midian וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׁבָּ֖ק <S%H3435><s%> and Ishbak וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֽׁוּחַ׃ <S%H7744><s%> and Shuah

וְיָקְשָׁ֣ן <S%H3370><s%> And Jokshan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבָ֖א <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּדָ֑ן <S%H1719><s%> and Dedan וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons דְדָ֔ן <S%H1719><s%> of Dedan הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אַשּׁוּרִ֥ם <S%H805><s%> were Asshurim וּלְטוּשִׁ֖ים <S%H3912><s%> and Letushim וּלְאֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3817><s%> and Leummim

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <S%H5891><s%> Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H6081><s%> and Epher וַחֲנֹ֔ךְ <S%H2585><s%> and Hanoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <S%H28><s%> and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <S%H420><s%> and Eldaah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All these [were] the children קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> of Keturah
וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> gave אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֖וֹ לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> all that he had unto Isaac

וְלִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> But unto the sons הַפִּֽילַגְשִׁים֙ <S%H6370><s%> of the concubines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> which Abraham נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> had Abraham מַתָּנֹ֑ת <S%H4979><s%> gifts וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֞ם <S%H7971><s%> and sent them away מֵעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> and יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> from Isaac בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son בְּעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> while he yet lived קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> unto the east

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These יְמֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> And these [are] the days שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8141><s%> of the years חַיֵּ֥י <S%H2416><s%> life אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> age מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> and seventy-five שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיִּגְוַ֨ע <S%H1478><s%> gave up the ghost וַיָּ֧מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> Then Abraham בְּשֵׂיבָ֥ה <S%H7872><s%> old age טוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> in a good זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2205><s%> an old man וְשָׂבֵ֑עַ <S%H7649><s%> and full וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <S%H622><s%> [of years] and was gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> to his people

וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <S%H6912><s%> buried אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> And his sons אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> him in the cave הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <S%H4375><s%> of Machpelah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in שְׂדֵ֞ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field עֶפְרֹ֤ן <S%H6085><s%> of Ephron בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צֹ֙חַר֙ <S%H6714><s%> of Zohar הַֽחִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <S%H4471><s%> Mamre

הַשָּׂדֶ֛ה <S%H7704><s%> The field אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which קָנָ֥ה <S%H7069><s%> purchased אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> which Abraham מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons חֵ֑ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth שָׁ֛מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there קֻבַּ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> buried אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> there was Abraham וְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> and Sarah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> that God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> by בְּאֵ֥ר לַחַ֖י רֹאִֽי׃ <S%H883><s%> the well Lahairoi ס

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these תֹּלְדֹ֥ת <S%H8435><s%> Now these [are] the generations יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֜ה <S%H3205><s%> bare הָגָ֧ר <S%H1904><s%> whom Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian שִׁפְחַ֥ת <S%H8198><s%> handmaid שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> Sarah's לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these שְׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael בִּשְׁמֹתָ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> by their names לְתוֹלְדֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> according to their generations בְּכֹ֤ר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael נְבָיֹ֔ת <S%H5032><s%> Nebajoth וְקֵדָ֥ר <S%H6938><s%> and Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <S%H110><s%> and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <S%H4017><s%> and Mibsam
וּמִשְׁמָ֥ע <S%H4927><s%> And Mishma וְדוּמָ֖ה <S%H1746><s%> and Dumah וּמַשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H4854><s%> and Massa
חֲדַ֣ד <S%H2301><s%> Hadad וְתֵימָ֔א <S%H8485><s%> and Tema יְט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> Naphish וָקֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6929><s%> and Kedemah

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הֵ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these שְׁמֹתָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> and these [are] their names בְּחַצְרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2691><s%> by their towns וּבְטִֽירֹתָ֑ם <S%H2918><s%> and by their castles שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten נְשִׂיאִ֖ם <S%H5387><s%> princes לְאֻמֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H523><s%> according to their nations

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> And these [are] the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְשֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַיִּגְוַ֣ע <S%H1478><s%> and he gave up the ghost וַיָּ֔מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <S%H622><s%> and was gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people

וַיִּשְׁכְּנ֨וּ <S%H7931><s%> And they dwelt מֵֽחֲוִילָ֜ה <S%H2341><s%> from Havilah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שׁ֗וּר <S%H7793><s%> unto Shur אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt בֹּאֲכָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> as thou goest אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <S%H804><s%> toward Assyria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> of all his brethren נָפָֽל׃ <S%H5307><s%> [and] he died פ

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֥ת <S%H8435><s%> And these [are] the generations יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> Isaac

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> was forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּקַחְתּ֣וֹ <S%H3947><s%> when he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִבְקָ֗ה <S%H7259><s%> Rebekah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter בְּתוּאֵל֙ <S%H1328><s%> of Bethuel הָֽאֲרַמִּ֔י <S%H761><s%> the Syrian מִפַּדַּ֖ן אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> of Padanaram אֲח֛וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister לָבָ֥ן <S%H3837><s%> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֖י <S%H761><s%> the Syrian ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיֶּעְתַּ֨ר <S%H6279><s%> intreated יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְנֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> for אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because עֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> because she [was] barren הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <S%H6279><s%> was intreated לוֹ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived רִבְקָ֥ה <S%H7259><s%> of him and Rebekah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

וַיִּתְרֹֽצֲצ֤וּ <S%H7533><s%> struggled together הַבָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the children בְּקִרְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7130><s%> within her וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and she said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> is so לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> am I וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לָ֗הּ שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> unto her Two [גֹיִים כ] (גֹויִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> Gentile ק) בְּבִטְנֵ֔ךְ <S%H990><s%> [are] in thy womb וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and two manner לְאֻמִּ֔ים <S%H3816><s%> of people מִמֵּעַ֖יִךְ <S%H4578><s%> from thy bowels יִפָּרֵ֑דוּ <S%H6504><s%> shall be separated וּלְאֹם֙ <S%H3816><s%> and [the one] people מִלְאֹ֣ם <S%H3816><s%> than [the other] people יֶֽאֱמָ֔ץ <S%H553><s%> shall be stronger וְרַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> and the elder יַעֲבֹ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> shall serve צָעִֽיר׃ <S%H6810><s%> the younger

וַיִּמְלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> were fulfilled יָמֶ֖יהָ <S%H3117><s%> And when her days לָלֶ֑דֶת <S%H3205><s%> to be delivered וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold תוֹמִ֖ם <S%H8380><s%> behold [there were] twins בְּבִטְנָֽהּ׃ <S%H990><s%> in her womb

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> came out הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> And the first אַדְמוֹנִ֔י <S%H132><s%> red כֻּלּ֖וֹ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּאַדֶּ֣רֶת <S%H155><s%> garment שֵׂעָ֑ר <S%H8181><s%> all over like an hairy וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> and they called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau

וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And after כֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> out אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וְיָד֤וֹ <S%H3027><s%> and his hand אֹחֶ֙זֶת֙ <S%H270><s%> took hold בַּעֲקֵ֣ב <S%H6119><s%> heel עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> on Esau's וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְיִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> [was] threescore שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּלֶ֥דֶת <S%H3205><s%> when she bare אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>
